@@ ICEY : 

If you previously had another loader (or previous version of this one ) you need first to use the same loader than before , click on uninstal then use this one by pressing instal .
For instance if your previous loader was WatRemove 2.1 you need to execute again wat remove to click on uninstal and then you use this one ...
